text: Poděbrady () is a town in Nymburk District in the Central Bohemian Region of the Czech Republic. About 15,000 people live there. Poděbrady is a famous spa town. It is on the river Elbe. In 1472, Poděbrady got the town privileges from King George of Poděbrady. == References== == Other websites == * Official website * Poděbrady spa Category:Towns in the Czech Republic Category:Spa towns in the Czech Republic Category:Central Bohemian Region
title: Poděbrady
